Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Maternal Crest
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: An extended crest for greater dominance over the nest.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Fine Dexterity Hands
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: A secondary pair of dextrous hands for finer manipulation.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Rending Claws
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Sharpened claws on the primary pair of hands.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Fecundity
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: All internal organs and abdomen are altered to maximize Egg Production efficiency.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Gene Expression Control
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Unlocks the metamorphic potential in the hive. Allows the addition or removal of genes within all offspring.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Meat Larder Serum
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: A potent growth serum which hive daughters can inject into prey to promote tissue growth above all else.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Maternal Stature
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Body hypertrophies to increase stature all the better to guide the hive.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Noble Stature
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Further growth increases mass to a truly noble stature.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Scything Blades
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Massive Blades which replace each of the primary hands entirely.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Genetic Storage
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Unlocks the ability to store genes in specially altered Ovamorphs.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: mutation expression
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Unlocks the ability to access genes on crypimorph mutated organisms and enhance or suppress their expression.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Jelly Wells
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Unlocks the ability to merge a hive daughter with a Larder in order to become a means of mass producing Resinous Jelly.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Genetic Digestion
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Unlocks the ability to extract genes from fresh corpses.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Imperial Stature
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: The penultimate expression of form, body grows to an astounding size.

Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.label: Genetic Self Expression
Xenomorphtype.RoyalEvolutionDef.description: Unlocks the ability to alter one's own genes.
